data.what_is:
Plotline is an in-app engagement platform for consumer internet companies.

Product and marketing teams can configure highly customizable in-app messages or nudges to improve feature adoption and drive conversions. Fully no-code.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Optimization
features.content: Optimizes marketing campaigns for mobile devices.

features.name: Integrations - Mobile Marketing
features.content: Integrates advertising/campaigns into mobile applications, games, and mobile browsers.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Facilitates global text message and mobile marketing campaigns.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects. This feature was mentioned in 10 Plotline reviews.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: As reported in 12 Plotline reviews. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. This feature was mentioned in 11 Plotline reviews.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 11 Plotline reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity. 10 reviewers of Plotline have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 11 Plotline reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline. This feature was mentioned in 10 Plotline reviews.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test changes to a screen by administering the change to a portion of visitors and measuring conversion.

features.name: WYSIWYG Editor
features.content: Quickly create variant web pages with an easy-to-use WYSIWYG editor.

features.name: Conversion Goal
features.content: Able to set any user action as the conversion goal of the test.

features.name: Percentage of Traffic
features.content: Able to adjust both the percentage of total traffic being tested and the proportion of the tested traffic that sees A and that sees B.

features.name: Confidence Level
features.content: Able to view or adjust the necessary confidence level of your test.

features.name: Multivariant Testing
features.content: Test multiple changes at once by directing traffic to a random combination of all changes being analyzed.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Break down a population of users by demographics, sequence actions, time, and able to build custom segments.

features.name: Reports and Dashboards
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards.

features.name: Standard Targeting
features.content: Deploy different versions of app screens based on user demographics, user activity, etc. with out-of-the-box configuration.

features.name: Custom Targeting
features.content: Show different versions based on any variable set up to be tracked on the app's back end.

features.name: Data Segmentation
features.content: Segment data by various user demographics to find deeper trends within specific user groups.

features.name: API / Integrations
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software. API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc. with other software applications.

features.name: QA TestingView full feature definition
features.content: Able to test that event and variable setup are reporting data accurately.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Application Attribution
features.content: Attributes app installs to the marketing campaigns and media sources that drove it.

features.name: Campaign Analysis
features.content: As reported in 10 Plotline reviews. Measures impact and effectiveness of mobile marketing campaigns.

features.name: Uninstall Tracking
features.content: Measures user-level uninstall insights.

features.name: Custom Dashboards
features.content: Creates custom data views to suit every team member's needs.

features.name: Proximity Marketing
features.content: Collects geo-location data on mobile users to customize relevant campaigns.

features.name: Push Notifications
features.content: Pushes notifications or text messages to mobile devices

features.name: Bulk SMS
features.content: Provides templates for mass mobile messaging campaigns

features.name: Two-Way Text Messaging
features.content: Facilitates two-way text messaging to encourage consumer engagement and loyalty

features.name: Email Campaigns
features.content: Personalizes and optimizes email mobile marketing campaigns.

features.name: Audience Segmentation
features.content: Identifies the most granular audience segments based on actions, inactions, and user properties.

features.name: Coupons and Promotions
features.content: Sends out coupons and promotions to reward and entice mobile device users.

features.name: Survey
features.content: Text-based surveys or quizzes related to user experience.

features.name: Video Snippets
features.content: Individually recorded video clips based on situations or prompts.

features.name: Video Interview
features.content: One-on-one video conferences with users.

features.name: Photo Submission
features.content: Screenshots or in-context photos sent in from users.

features.name: Text/Notes
features.content: Text responses to situational prompts.

features.name: In-App
features.content: Intercepting users during application usage.

features.name: In-Store
features.content: Intercepting customers during in-person shopping experience.

features.name: On-Site
features.content: Intercepting visitors while on particular webpage.

features.name: Recruitment Pool
features.content: Vendor-provided database of respondents.

features.name: Analytics
features.content: Actionable data generated from user responses.

features.name: Collaboration
features.content: Collaborative tools for analyzing or repurposing responses.

features.name: Sorting
features.content: Tools for tagging, storing, and searching responses.

features.name: Survey Implementation
features.content: Allows you to deploy NPS surveys to users.

features.name: Data Analysis
features.content: Analyzes user survey responses and information in the application.

features.name: User Segmentation
features.content: Organizes users into predefined groups and provides different responses based on group.

features.name: Multi-Language Support
features.content: Supports multiple languages.

features.name: Behavior-responsive Messaging
features.content: Provides responses based on user behavior and feedback.

features.name: Audio-visual Walkthroughs
features.content: Supports audio and video-based walkthroughs.

features.name: Text Bubble Walkthroughs
features.content: Supports text bubble walkthroughs.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Provides native A/B testing for content and campaigns.

features.name: Customer Profiles
features.content: Allows users to build and analyze customer profiles.

features.name: Behavioral Targeting
features.content: Presents messaging depending on customer behavior.

features.name: Contextual Targeting
features.content: Presents messaging depending on customer context.

features.name: Geofencing
features.content: Content triggered by customer's given geolocation.

features.name: Triggered Emails
features.content: Emails triggered by customer activity or behavior.

features.name: Triggered Messages
features.content: Messages triggered by customer activity or behavior.

features.name: Recommendation Engine
features.content: Provides recommendations based on customer metrics.

features.name: Personalized Discounts
features.content: Calculates and presents customized discounts.

features.name: Website Personalization
features.content: Personalizes web experiences and presented content based on customer metrics.

features.name: Templates
features.content: Provide templates for customer journey mapping to jumpstart the process.

features.name: Exporting
features.content: Ability to export customer journey maps in a variety of formats to present and analyze.

features.name: Multi-user Access and Collaboration
features.content: Allow team members to invite others to collaborate on journey maps and make direct changes.

features.name: Multiple Personas
features.content: Provide the ability to compare the experiences of multiple personas in one journey map.

features.name: Data Analytics
features.content: Ability to integrate with cross-channel, real-time data analytics to power customer journey map creation.

features.name: Reporting and Analytics
features.content: Provides reporting and analytics tools to quantify the results of the experiment.

features.name: Heatmaps
features.content: Provides heatmap functionality to assess what parts of the website visitors are engaging with most.

features.name: Multivariate testing capacities
features.content: Allows for the testing of multiple variables at a time during a single test.

features.name: Concurrent Testing
features.content: Allows multiple experiments to be deployed simultaneously.

features.name: Mobile Testing
features.content: Allows mobile web pages to be tested during A/B experiments.

features.name: WYSIWYG
features.content: What You See is What You Get (WYSIWYG) features allow the editing of web pages without HTML. This means you can directly edit pages with images and text without any coding.

features.name: AI/Machine Learning
features.content: Uses algorithms and continuous data entry to enable the technology to develop insights and optimize testing.

features.name: Little to No Coding
features.content: Requires little to no knowledge of coding. Usually this means it comes with prewritten code.

initial_reviews.review_title: Helped substantially improve in-app engagement, messaging, and growth objectives
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plotline?
The ability to design and deploy a variety of in-app campaigns (stories, spotlights, coachmarks, tooltips, in-app videos) without any engineering effort is phenomenal. TAT for these via Plotline has been cut down to a few minutes vs a few days if done via development.

What do you dislike about Plotline?
There can be more customisation options for in-app elements. The dashboard is a little slow to use and can be improved.

What problems is Plotline solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Improving funnel conversions and reducing drop offs via in app interventions and nudges
- Reducing bandwidth usage of developers by allowing a no-code way to run these in-app nudges on a day to day basis
- Allowing easier data collection in-app with surveys
- Deploy unique engagement tools such as stories, banners, etc. in app without dev effort

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Plotline?
review_question_answers.answer: The ability to design and deploy a variety of in-app campaigns (stories, spotlights, coachmarks, tooltips, in-app videos) without any engineering effort is phenomenal. TAT for these via Plotline has been cut down to a few minutes vs a few days if done via development.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Plotline?
review_question_answers.answer: There can be more customisation options for in-app elements. The dashboard is a little slow to use and can be improved.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Plotline solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
- Improving funnel conversions and reducing drop offs via in app interventions and nudges
- Reducing bandwidth usage of developers by allowing a no-code way to run these in-app nudges on a day to day basis
- Allowing easier data collection in-app with surveys
- Deploy unique engagement tools such as stories, banners, etc. in app without dev effort

initial_reviews.review_title: Dynamic App Updates Made Easy
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plotline?
Plotline allows us to dynamically change our app's content without needing new app releases or heavy engineering work.

What do you dislike about Plotline?
Occasionally, we encounter minor bugs, but the Plotline team is always quick to resolve them.

What problems is Plotline solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're now able to make quick, effective changes to our app's interface and content, bypassing the lengthy app release process and reducing engineering workload.

initial_reviews.review_title: This tool works wonders for engaging users within the app and analyzing their behavior.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plotline?
Plotline is super user-friendly for beginners, but if you're keen on getting into the nitty-gritty details, it's got you covered! It's really thorough when it comes to analytics, and the best part? It's lightning fast. We use it daily, and one of the standout features is their ongoing support - they're always there to help us fine-tune our setup!

What do you dislike about Plotline?
So far, we haven't found anything to dislike. It's really cool how they keep making it better and adding new stuff all the time.

What problems is Plotline solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Plotline, we can talk to our users directly using in-app messages and surveys. It's awesome for reaching out to specific users while they're in the app.
